title: Child-related emergency leave without invasive documentation
description: Child-related emergency leave without invasive documentation
content:
Scenario: Child-related emergency leave without invasive documentation
    Given children have emergencies requiring immediate parent presence
    And Maria cannot ask co-parent to handle while she works
    When Maria needs emergency leave for child crisis
    Then she should access immediate leave without bureaucratic barriers
    And she should not have to prove emergency legitimacy with invasive documentation
    And emergency leave should be available quickly and with dignity
    And workplace should trust that single parents take leave only when truly necessary
    And Maria should handle emergencies without fear of job consequences
